section.title: Query
section.para: A query contains the structure of the LHS of a rule only (you don't specify "when" or "then"). It is simply a way to query the working memory for facts that match the conditions stated.

You use WorkingMemory.getQueryResults("name") by using the query name. This will return a list of Tuple instances. Each Tuple instance has one or more FactHandles. To get to the original Fact object, use WorkingMemory.getObject(factHandle).
